website_summaries.verdict: The overall reception for the Puma Hybrid Astro was highly positive. The aesthetics of the shoe was highly appreciated by the purchasers. They deemed this long-distance running shoe fit for both casual and running occasions. There were some complaints regarding the constriction of movements, but a lot of the runners were satisfied by the overall durability, comfort, and stability of the shoe.
pros: Some purchasers say that the Puma Hybrid Astro delivers high energy-return making each of their strides quick
The PROFOAM technology added in the midsole of the shoe provides a high rebound, says some buyers
Some of the users lauded the high level of support and cushioning of the shoe
A lot of the runners like the customizable fit the shoe offers because of the NETFIT technology employed along with the lacing system of the shoe
The shoe is highly durable, some purchasers state
The shoe offers snug-fit and stability, according to several wearers
The overall aesthetic of the shoe is lauded by various people because of the shoe’s stylish features
The external heel counter of the shoe is praised by numerous users for its flexibility
cons: The Netfit upper of the shoe is too constricting for some of the users
The downside of the Hybrid foam employed in the midsole of the shoe is that it makes the shoe feel heavier, according to a few wearers
Some of the male runners find it difficult to tighten the laces
For the female runners, some of them claim that the shoe is loose on the heel area

customer_reviews.title: Best puma hybrid
customer_reviews.text: Puma hybrid Astro the best hybrid in the line of puma - I have the rocket runner, desert runner, NxT , Jaab XT ,
customer_reviews.author: PUMA GO TIME

customer_reviews.title: Just to narrow in the toes
customer_reviews.text: Too small in the toebox. The cushioning was super comfortable, but no room for my big toe. I have speed 500s that are a sock like upper and allow for that.
customer_reviews.author: Koi

customer_reviews.title: Works well for women too
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I'm a woman and usually wear about an 8 in women's. My feet are obviously expanding in my mid-30s. All my old athletic shoes were way too tight. So I was in the market for a new pair. I found some pretty women's shoes, but these really caught my eye. I bough the smallest size and they are super comfortable. I love the design and I'm completely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: m.m.herman

customer_reviews.title: Like the overall design of the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are good! Fit really well and the colors are good as well!
customer_reviews.author: Varun Narendrakumar Jain

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable, and look fantastic
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are incredibly comfortable. As an ER nurse I log a ton of steps over 12 hours, and these beauties are now my go-to. I lost count of the number of compliments I got on them.
customer_reviews.author: johnny

customer_reviews.title: Not in original packaging
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 pairs of these running shoes 2 days apart. I like the first pair so much i ordered another pair for outside running. My first pair showed up in original packaging. BUT the second pair which arrived this morning was not in original packaging i.e. no Puma Box. It seems that they are also brand new like the first pair but why no box. Does not seem like much but it has me wondering why Amazon omitted the packaging on the second shipment. otherwise great running shoes and I look forward to using them this afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Doucet

customer_reviews.title: smaller than usual
customer_reviews.text: I use a variety of sneakers for running, walking, hiking. I decided to try these because I liked it outwardly. For many years I have been buying sneakers from different manufacturers in size twelve. These are the first ones that squeeze my legs so much. I did several walks for several miles. Hoped they would get better for my leg. In vain. A normal size 12 would fit 12.5-13 this shoe size. I expected them to be very soft on the heel. However, I have two pairs of other brands that are much nicer on the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Definitely one of the better sneaker purchases I've made.
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are ******* cool! I love the vaporwave design. They are cushy. They are keepers. PS. I have wide feet. Going a size up ensured a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: KINGofNORRISTOWN

customer_reviews.title: Good look good fit
customer_reviews.text: Shoe came promptly. I am using the to run and they are stable and comfortable plenty of cushion to prevent joint pain during and after runs. Not to mention the look excessively cool!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and am very flat-footed - I finally found a shoe that works for me for exercising and walking and biking and for hard surfaces while playing pickleball - I now have three pairs of these shoes....
customer_reviews.author: Grant Serafy

customer_reviews.title: Lacks cushioning in the heels
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after seeing stellar reviews on some websites. It turns out they are not that comfortable: they clearly lack cushioning in the heels compared to other "comfortable" shoes that I have.
customer_reviews.author: Y Gong

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Like running on a pillow. I have a foot issue and these shoes allow me to run 5 and 10 K race with little of no issue that I have had before with other shoes. I recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Puma Shoes
customer_reviews.text: All Puma shoes are way too narrow in the toes and not for people with a high instep
customer_reviews.author: Ed Z

customer_reviews.title: Ran a little small, but great show
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quaility. Comfortable. I normally where size 12 in most brands, puma, nike, etc. But had to return 12's for 13's in this specific shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Flack

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I have received compliments as a result of wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Miles

customer_reviews.title: satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shoe , couldbt be happier great color scheme
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Let me keep the five stars going...
customer_reviews.text: If you have made it down this far to my review trust me just go ahead and buy them. I bought two pair (different colors) because I was so impressed. It was not only the style but the comfortability that sold me. My heels feel amazing. I love them and you're going to love them too!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon SJ

customer_reviews.title: Good and cheap shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for jogging or 10 k running. Very comfortable, the forefoot is a little bit narrow.
customer_reviews.author: moshe benollon

customer_reviews.title: Quite Loud. Remote not included.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe. Light weight. Color is vibrant and I am often asked to turn the volume down. Great shoe if you like hearing the same joke all day. Good shoe though, but it should be a good shoe, it's not a blender.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Unique by design stand out in a crowd shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were really awesome. My son got them from me on Christmas and gets compliments continuously on them
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Love em. Most comfortable shoes for the price that I own. IF I ran or wanted to run, I could see myself running in these.
customer_reviews.author: Tide47

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: It fits really good. It is a really beautiful shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are true to size and fits comfortably. My son wears a size 13 W and this 13 fits him comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Hybrid Astro
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really great shoe and it looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought them because I been buying pumas all my life and these were perfect match with my MIAMI DOLPHINS SWEATSUIT
customer_reviews.author: Dana Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: I like this product...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Light weight and more comfort.. its very good for running..
customer_reviews.author: sumeer sk

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my son and loved the fit he said there very comfy
customer_reviews.author: Chan

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: The soles are very comfortable, running and jumping are more suitable for my feet, and then I bought another pair, which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for wider foot female!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for women with wider feet as well. Excellent long distance running shor
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. Comfortable and great looking! Gonna grab another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: My first pair of pumas
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Nike guy but this is a great shoe and I’ll be trying some of their other products
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love how comfortable they are on my feet . 8 hour shifts and my feet don't hurt like previous Nikes.
customer_reviews.author: KingDavid Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good for overall working out
customer_reviews.text: Shoes good for jumping rope and running. Have really good support. I really like the way they look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: puma hybrid astro Snickers!!
customer_reviews.text: love it! It's a really good product. If there's a good product, I'll buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Seo Hyun

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. Helps me feel like I am griping the ground more when I'm on my runs.
customer_reviews.author: David Misery

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these, he say they feel soooooooo good on his feet.
customer_reviews.author: Konnie Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Received the wrong shoe in a completely different size. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nea

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Hybrid Astro Sneaker
product_meta.description: Hybrid foam – cushioning & responsiveness NETFIT upper – customizable fit technology peppered with style: The hybrid astro is a game changer for everyday cushioned running shoes. The hybrid foam is a mix of our two most innovative midsole foam ignite and nrgy. The nrgy beads provide instant cushion and comfort while the ignite foam provides fantastic responsiveness to propel you faster.
